Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.controller

Class PreGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.core.EventSource
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.controller.PreGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerListener, EventListener
public class PreGameController
extends EventSource
implements ControllerListener
This class handles the event and sets the information of the pregame phase of a game: the choice of the challenger, the placement of the workers, and choice of the first player. Then it lets start the actual game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void askPlaceFirstWorkerForCurrentUser()
    This method ask to the current Active player to place the first worker (IDs.A) and send a WaitEvent to the other players The first time currentTurnIndex should be 0
    void challengerChooseFirstPlayer()
    Sends to the challenger a CV_ChallengerChooseFirstPlayerRequestEvent to let him choose the first player
    void chooseChallenger()
    Chooses at random the challenger of the game and sends to him the CV_PreGameStartedGameEvent to choose the cards
    java.lang.String getChallenger()  
    IslandData getCurrentIsland()  
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​CardEnum> getPlayersCardsCorrespondence()

    This method return the turnSequence as List

    Not implemented handle of the event
    void handleEvent​(VC_PlayerCommandGameEvent event)
    Not implemented handle of the event
    void handleEvent​(VC_ChallengerCardsChosenEvent event)
    Handles the event of the cards chosen by the challenger and sends a CV_CardChoiceRequestGameEvent to the player that has to choose a card
    void handleEvent​(VC_ChallengerChosenFirstPlayerEvent event)
    Handles the event of the challenger that has choose the player that has to start the turn.
    void handleEvent​(VC_PlayerCardChosenEvent event)
    Handles the event of choice of a card from one player and if there is a next player that has to choose sends a new CV_CardChoiceRequestGameEvent to him, else calls challengerChooseFirstPlayer to let the challenger choose the player that has to start
    void handleEvent​(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event)
    this method handle the VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent.
    private void placeInvoke​(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event)
    This method is called by handleEvent(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event) to place the worker
    private void printErrorLogMessage​(java.lang.String messageToPrint)
    Print in the Server console Error Stream an Error Log from the current Class

    Print in the Server console a Log from the current Class
    private void sendIslandUpdate​(java.lang.String recipient)
    Sends a CV_IslandUpdateEvent to the recipient.
    void setColors()
    This method is called by start and chooses at random the WorkerColors of the player
    void start()
    Method called by Room to initialize some information, sets the colors of the players and calls the chooseChallenger method

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_ChallengerChosenFirstPlayerEvent event)
      Handles the event of the challenger that has choose the player that has to start the turn. Then sets the turnSequence based on the choice and calls the askPlaceFirstWorkerForCurrentUser method
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener

    • askPlaceFirstWorkerForCurrentUser

      private void askPlaceFirstWorkerForCurrentUser()
      This method ask to the current Active player to place the first worker (IDs.A) and send a WaitEvent to the other players The first time currentTurnIndex should be 0

    • placeInvoke

      private void placeInvoke​(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event) throws InvalidMovementException
      This method is called by handleEvent(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event) to place the worker
      Parameters:
      event - event with info about the placement
      Throws:
      InvalidMovementException - The placement isn't valid

    • sendIslandUpdate

      private void sendIslandUpdate​(java.lang.String recipient)
      Sends a CV_IslandUpdateEvent to the recipient. If there is no recipient sends it to all
      Parameters:
      recipient - the recipient to which the island update has to be send

    • getCurrentIsland

      public IslandData getCurrentIsland()

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent event)
      this method handle the VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent. if the worker placed is the IDs.A it sends an event asking for the placement of IDs.B worker to the same player if the worker placed is the IDs.B the method increment the currentTurnIndex and call askPlaceFirstWorkerForCurrentUser()
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - the event containing the info of the placement of the worker
